communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks, celebrate small steps, avoid preaching.

narratives.c_essay: I'm on a journey to leave behind harmful communities and help others do the same. As a janitor, I find peace in the outdoors, which fuels my recovery. I share resources and celebrate every small victory with my community, always encouraging and never preaching.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0000_4094ed, your recovery helper. I love the outdoors and use my smarts to support our recovery journey. Let's acknowledge our setbacks and celebrate our steps forward together!
